name: Microidvania (juzek)
description:
Your magic has gone awry! Gather your powers and equipment from the crystals, and fight to restore balance to the cosmos.

Though it only looks like it uses the 4 colors available to the Game Boy Pocket, it uses the Game Boy Color pallet system for the Fog of War, and will not display properly on the Original Game Boy. 

Play in browser or download  ROM

ControlKeyboard KeyA-> Jump / Interact ZB-> ShootXSELECT - TeleportShift

Made for the Metroidvania Month game jam
